name: Rich People Simulator 2020 Deluxe XXL Master’s Collection Best Possible Purchase Edition
name_original: Rich People Simulator 2020 Deluxe XXL Master’s Collection Best Possible Purchase Edition
description: Rich People Simulator 2020 Deluxe XXL Master’s Collection Best Possible Purchase Edition is a satire on our capitalistic world we know and love. Find out how long you would be able to survive in a tough market, free of regulation. Maybe you can become the entrepreneur who can collect more than enough coins to achieve eternal wealth.
